product_name: adidas Terrex Swift T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Light, breathable and moisture-wicking interlock fabric makes the men's adidas Terrex Swift T-Shirt a wardrobe staple for your warm-weather training runs. ClimaLite(R) polyester fabric, worn close to the skin wicks sweat away from your body to keep you cool; fabric dries quickly when wet. Mesh inserts on side panels optimize cooling airflow and comfort. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Overstock.
short_description: Light, breathable and moisture-wicking interlock fabric makes the men's adidas Terrex Swift T-Shirt a wardrobe staple for your warm-weather training runs.
